statements: SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT building_id, building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT building_name, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildings WHERE carbon_footprint > 1000 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings WHERE carbon_footprint < 5000 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT building_name, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, location FROM GreenBuildings WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY building_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings WHERE building_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, carbon_footprint FROM green_buildings WHERE carbon_footprint > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY electricity_usage DESC;
SELECT building_name, water_usage FROM energy_consumption JOIN green_buildings ON energy_consumption.building_id = green_buildings.building_id;
SELECT building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM green_buildings WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM green_buildings WHERE carbon_footprint > 50 ORDER BY building_name ASC

SELECT building_name, electricity_usage, water_usage FROM green_buildings INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption.building_id WHERE electricity_usage >= 1000 ORDER BY electricity_usage DESC
SELECT building_name, location FROM green_buildings WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM green_buildings WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC
SELECT building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM green_buildings WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') AND carbon_footprint < 50
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM green_buildings;
SELECT total_carbon_emissions FROM green_buildings WHERE building_location = 'New York';
SELECT building_id, building_name, total_carbon_emissions FROM green_buildings WHERE total_carbon_emissions > 50;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emission_data ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, total_carbon_emissions FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM green_buildings WHERE total_carbon_emissions > 1000;
SELECT building_name, emission_date, emission_value FROM green_buildings JOIN carbon_emission_data ON green_buildings.building_id = carbon_emission_data.building_id;

SELECT building_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM green_buildings JOIN carbon_emission_data ON green_buildings.building_id = carbon_emission_data.building_id JOIN emission_analysis ON carbon_emission_data.data_id = emission_analysis.data_id;
SELECT DISTINCT building_location FROM green_buildings WHERE total_carbon_emissions < 5000;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildings WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT building_name, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings WHERE location = 'New York' AND carbon_footprint < 50;
SELECT building_name, AVG(carbon_footprint) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings GROUP BY building_name HAVING AVG(carbon_footprint) > 50;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildings WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT building_name, SUM(electricity_consumption) AS total_electricity_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT gb.building_name, es.source_name FROM GreenBuildings gb JOIN EnergySources es ON gb.building_id = es.source_id;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildings WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT E.building_id, E.emission_type, EM.energy_usage FROM Emissions E JOIN EnergyConsumption EM ON E.building_id = EM.building_id;
SELECT M.building_id, M.parameter, M.value, E.source_type FROM Measurements M JOIN EnergySources E ON M.building_id = E.source_id;
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM Measurements GROUP BY building_id HAVING num_records > 5;
SELECT building_name, location, carbon_footprint FROM GreenBuildings WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT building_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM GreenBuildings JOIN Emissions ON GreenBuildings.building_id = Emissions.building_id GROUP BY building_name
SELECT source_type, COUNT(*) AS total_sources FROM EnergySources GROUP BY source_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT building_name, parameter, value, measurement_date FROM Measurements WHERE building_id = 2 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC
